org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.zookeeper

Class ZooKeeperConfigurationRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.scaleout.zookeeper.ZooKeeperConfigurationRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class ZooKeeperConfigurationRegister
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    This registers a given hadoop configuration with a zookeeper cluster. Configurations are serialized in the form of key=value key2=value2 This is meant for use by a map reduce cluster to getFromOrigin run time configuration parameters. Usage: ZooKeeperConfigurationRegiste register = ... register.register();

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZooKeeperConfigurationRegister

        public ZooKeeperConfigurationRegister(org.canova.api.conf.Configuration configuration,
                                      java.lang.String id,
                                      java.lang.String host,
                                      int port)
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to serialize
        id - the job id to store metadata for
        host - host of the zookeeper cluster (note this is also provided to help setup the zk directory structure)
        port - the port of the zookeeper cluster (note this is also provided to help setup the zk directory structure)
